author: jordan_br
content: Hey man, that’s an area that I’m really interested in as well! I saw this awesome post the other day  (https://ethresear.ch/t/targeting-zero-mev-a-content-layer-solution/9224/26) which discusses introducing a content later to remove hidden centralisation coming from the miners. Would be happy to team up on an MEV project, perhaps building off of this research if it’s something you’re interested in. There’s also a couple more MEV resources I’ve got in my notes on the repo (jordanbrannan.md)

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!835519759545401344> there are most certainly ways to get involved.  I would recommend aggregating a list of projects that are currently working on rollup based solutions, learning about what they are doing, and looking for ways that you can contribute.  If you don't already know how the technology of rollups work you should do that homework first.
